name: Neon Blast
description:
In Neon Blast, the gamepad/keyboard is used to control a ball that can be recolored via color fields and destroys blocks of the same color. Furthermore, there are sliding stones and skull fields that cost a life. A level is solved when all destructible blocks are destroyed, the faster this happens, the more bonus points you get.




Features
  • challenging puzzle game
  • 50 unique levels
  • stylish, modern and clean graphics
  • amazing soundtrack
  • lightweight game engine
